info.title: Company and Document Management API
info.description: API for managing companies, documents, products, and payments

post.summary: Authenticate and receive a bearer token

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid token or missing authentication

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

get.summary: Get a paginated list of documents

schema.description: Filter from this date (inclusive). Format AAAA-MM-DD
Filter to this date (inclusive). Format AAAA-MM-DD
0 = Sending. 1XX = Retrying sending. 2XX = Rejected by Tax Bureau. 1 = Received by Tax Bureau. 2 = Closed without sending. 3 = Imported from another system.
0,1 = In process. 2 = Rejected by tax bureau. 3 = Accepted by tax bureau. 4 = Accepted by tax bureau with warnings.
Document type ID according to the country

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid token or missing authentication

get.summary: Get a paginated list of received documents

400.description: Invalid status or document not found

get.summary: Get a specific digital certificate link

schema.description: Certificate ID of the created link

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

post.summary: Create a new digital certificate link

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid token or missing authentication

post.description: Creates a new payment with the given details.

schema.description: Payment ID of the created payment

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

post.description: Adds a new product with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all products, with optional search parameters.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status. If not sent, it will only present products with status = 1.

get.description: Fetches details of a product by its ID.

400.description: Invalid data or product not found

delete.description: Removes a product identified by its ID.

post.summary: Creates a new product price list
post.description: Creates a new product price list with the given details.

name.description: Name of the products price list.

product_price_list_id.description: Unique identifier for the newly created products price list.

name.description: Name of the newly created products price list.

get.description: Returns a list of all products price lists.

200.description: A list of products price lists.

product_price_list_id.description: Unique identifier for a products price list.

name.description: Name of the products price list.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific products price list
get.description: Fetches details of a products price list by its ID.

parameters.name: product_price_list_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the products price list.

200.description: Details of the specified products price list.

product_price_list_id.description: Unique identifier for the products price list.

name.description: Name of the products price list.

400.description: Invalid data or product price list not found

delete.summary: Deletes a specific products price list
delete.description: Removes a products price list identified by its ID.

parameters.name: product_price_list_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the products price list to delete.

post.description: Creates a new product location with the given details.

company_branch_id.description: Identifier for the company branch associated with the product location.

product_location_id.description: Unique identifier for the newly created product location.

name.description: Name of the newly created product location.

status.description: Status of the newly created product location.

company_branch_id.description: Identifier for the company branch associated with the newly created product location.

get.description: Returns a list of all product locations.

product_location_id.description: Unique identifier for the product location.

company_branch_id.description: Identifier for the company branch associated with the product location.

get.description: Returns the details of a product location.

200.description: The detail of a product location.

product_location_id.description: Unique identifier for the product location.

company_branch_id.description: Identifier for the company branch associated with the product location.

400.description: Invalid data or product location not found

delete.description: Removes a products location identified by its ID.

parameters.name: product_location_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the products location to delete.

post.description: Creates a new product category with the given details.

parent_product_category_id.description: Identifier of the parent category. null if there is no parent category.

product_category_id.description: Unique identifier for the newly created product category.

name.description: Name of the newly created product category.

parent_product_category_id.description: Identifier for the parent category. null if there is no parent category.

get.description: Returns a list of all product categories.

product_category_id.description: Unique identifier for the product category.

parent_product_category_id.description: Identifier for the parent category. null if no parent.

get.description: Returns the details of a product category.

200.description: The detail of a product category.

product_category_id.description: Unique identifier for the product category.

parent_product_category_id.description: Identifier for the parent category. null if no parent.

400.description: Invalid data or product category not found

delete.description: Removes a products category identified by its ID.

parameters.name: product_category_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the products category to delete.

grant_type.description: Use the text 'password' for password type grant

username.description: API username, not be confused with your website username

password.description: API password, not be confused with your website password

company_billing_id.description: Read only. ID of this specific billing information to be used when issuing documents

tax_id_type.description: Tax ID type according to tax ID table. If not entered, you won't be able to use this billing_data for invoices and documents that require it

country_id.description: Country ID according to ID table

company_contact_id.description: Read only. ID of this specific contact

last_name_primary.description: Last name or first last name

email_subject.description: The subject line of the email.

sender_email.description: The email address of the sender.

document_date.description: The date when the document was created or issued.

receive_date.description: The date when the document was received.

inbox_document_status.description: The current status of the document in the inbox.

document_id.description: The identifier assigned to the created document.

issuer_tax_id_code.description: Tax ID code according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

issuer_tax_id_type.description: Tax ID type according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

document_type_id.description: Document type ID according to document type table.

document_type_taxbureau.description: Type of document at the tax bureau.

document_number.description: A unique number assigned to the document.

purchase_order.description: The identifier for the purchase order.

reception_confirmation_status.description: Indicates the status of the reception confirmation for the document.

reception_confirmation_date.description: The date when the reception of the document was confirmed.

receiver_tax_id_code.description: The tax identification code of the document receiver.

receiver_tax_id_type.description: Tax ID type according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

document_approval_status.description: Indicates the current approval status of the document.

document_approval_date.description: The date on which the document was approved.

product_receipt_status.description: Indicates the current status of the product receipt.

product_receipt_date.description: The date on which the product was received.

product_receipt_location.description: The location where the product was received.

net_amount.description: Total of all net values from each of the detail lines.

template_id.description: It corresponds to the ID of the print template for the document. If not provided, the default template will be used. If provided and the template is not found, the default template will be used.

gross_values.description: This field is only valid for electronic receipts (document_type_id = 39, Chile) and allows the values to be entered as gross amounts (including VAT) for the line items, with the total being directly calculated as the multiplication of the item prices by the quantities. The total calculated in this way will be slightly different from the one obtained by rounding the net amounts and calculating VAT on the net total. The amounts will be adjusted and saved as net values in Koywe, but respecting the rounding applied to the gross amounts.

rounding_type.description:
You can input values as net or gross.
Rounding on gross values will calculate the total value for each line including VAT, and then adjust the document's VAT totals to match the final amount.
Rounding on net values will calculate the multiplications of net values line by line, and then apply the VAT to the total net amount to get the VAT and the total.

company_web.description: You can enter a website URL, which will replace the one registered in the Koywe account data and will be reflected in the automatic email sent to the recipient. It must start with http:// or https://.

company_email.description: You can enter an email, which will replace the one registered in the Koywe account data and will be reflected in the automatic email sent to the document recipient.

document_type_id.description:
Document type ID according to document type table. 
Chile :
2 = Factura electrnica
32 = Factura exenta electrnica
37 = Boleta electrnica
41 = Boleta exenta electrnica
54 = Gua de despacho electrnica
17 = Nota de dbito electrnica
16 = Nota de crdito electrnica
46 = Factura exportacin electrnica
47 = Nota de dbito de exportacin electrnica
48 = Nota de crdito de exportacin electrnica

document_number.description: Allows defining the folio to be used for issuing the document. By default, this field should NOT be used, so the folio is automatically assigned by the sequence.

receiver_tax_id_code.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts, and optional for other documents.
RUT without dots, with a hyphen
Format: NNNNNNNN-X

receiver_legal_name.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts. Optional for other documents.
Legal name of the document receiver.

receiver_address.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts. Optional for other documents.
Address of the document receiver.

receiver_district.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts. Optional for other documents.
District of the document receiver.

receiver_city.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts. Optional for other documents.
City of the document receiver.

receiver_phone.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, debit notes, named receipts, and exempt named receipts. Optional for other documents.
Phone of the document receiver.

receiver_activity.description:
Required for invoices, credit notes, and debit notes.
Optional for other documents.
Receiver activity of the document receiver.
Named receipts should NOT include this field.

receiver_postalcode.description: Optional postal code according to the national format.

receiver_state_id.description: Refers to the recipient's state. Empty if it doesn't apply. This is a required field on some countries, check the examples for your country

receiver_country_id.description: Refers to the recipient's country. If not provided, the default is the same country as the issuer. It is mainly used for export documents.

payment_conditions.description:
Payment dates separated by commas
0 = cash
30 = 30 days
0,30 = 50% cash, 50% in 30 days
0,30,60 = 33% cash, 33% in 30 days, 34% in 60 days.

seller_id.description: User ID (Koywe) that will be assigned as the seller associated with the document.

currency_id.description:
Only for export documents.
Valid values according to the table in annexes.

exchange_rate_value.description: Only when currency_id is defined and its value is not Chilean peso.

service_indicator.description:
It is optional to complete for export documents.
Valid values:
1 = Invoice for periodic household services.
2 = Invoice for other periodic services.
3 = Service Invoice
4 = Hospitality Services
5 = International Land Transport Service

sale_modality.description:
Only for export documents: optional.
Valid values:
1 = Sale agreed
2 = Under condition
3 = Free consignment
4 = Consignment with minimum sale
9 = No payment

sale_clause.description:
Only for export documents: optional.
Valid values:
1 = CIF
2 = CFR
3 = EXW
4 = FAS
5 = FOB
6 = S/CL
9 = DDP
10 = FCA
11 = CPT
12 = CIP
17 = DAT
18 = DAP
8 = Other

guide_type.description:
Required ONLY for dispatch guides.
1 = Operation constitutes sale
2 = Sales to be made
3 = Consignments
4 = Free delivery
5 = Internal transfers
6 = Other non-sale transfers
7 = Return guide
8 = Transfer for export (non-sale)
9 = Sale for export

transfer_type.description:
Required ONLY for dispatch guides that are not internal transfers.
1 = Dispatch on behalf of the recipient
2 = Dispatch on behalf of the issuer to recipient's facilities
3 = Dispatch on behalf of the issuer to other facilities

branch_office_code.description:
This field should only be completed for companies that use branches.
To issue from the head office, this field should NOT be entered.
The code entered must correspond to the 'internal code' entered in Koywe.

deployment_observations.description:
0 = do not include remark in XML or PDF
1 = include remark in XML and PDF
2 = include remark in PDF and do NOT include in XML
3 = include remark in XML and do NOT include in PDF
In all cases, regardless of its display, the remark will be saved in Koywe and will be visible in the document details on facto.cl.
If this option is not entered, the default value is considered to be 1, which will display the remark in the XML and PDF.

quantity.description: Quantity (can have up to 6 decimals, separate with a dot, not with a comma).

line_description.description: Short description to be included in the invoice as line title. Max 100 chars.

unit_price.description: Unit price (can have up to 6 decimals, separate with a dot, not with a comma). If using the 'gross_values' option, it must be the value including VAT.

long_description.description: Allows adding an additional long description to the detail description for the document.

unit_measure.description: Unit that this line is measured in.

modifier_amount.description:
Amount to discount or surcharge.
If it is a discount, use a negative value.
If this is used, do not use discount_or_surcharge_percentage.

modifier_percentage.description: Percentage to discount or surcharge. If it is a discount, use a negative value. If this is used, do not use discount_or_surcharge_amount.

total_amount_line.description: Total amount for this line, including taxes and modifiers.

document_type_id.description: Document type of the referenced document.

reference_type.description:
Chile: Otros documentos que no son documentos
tributarios electrnicos: (debe usarse cdigo
referencia = 5)
801 = Orden de compra
802 = Nota de pedido
803 = Contrato
804 = Resolucin
805 = Proceso ChileCompra
806 = Ficha ChileCompra
807 = DUS
808 = B/L (Conocimiento de embarque)
809 = AWB (Air Will Bill)
810 = MIC/DTA
811 = Carta de Porte
812 = Resolucin del SNA donde califica
Servicios de Exportacin
813 = Pasaporte
814 = Certificado de Depsito Bolsa Prod.
Chile.
815 = Vale de Prenda Bolsa Prod.

reference_number.description: Number of the referenced document. In the case of a global reference, it must be 0.

reference_code.description:
1 = cancel
2 = correct text
3 = correct quantity
4 = set
5 = reference to other non-tax documents
6 = reference to dispatch guide
7 = global reference to a type of document (allows reducing the amount for all documents of this type for this particular client).

reference_date.description: It should only be entered when using a reference that is not an electronic tax document. (YYYY-MM-DD).

discount_surcharge_code.description:
DA = Global discount on taxable
DE = Global discount on exempt
RA = Global surcharge on taxable
RE = Global surcharge on exempt

discount_surcharge_value.description: Value of the discount or surcharge.

discount_surcharge_type.description:
$ = Value will be applied as an amount
% = Value will be applied as a percentage of the amount

vat_credit_construction_company.description:
65% credit for construction companies. Article 21 of Decree Law No. 910/75.
This is the only code that operates in the opposite manner to the rest, as it is subtracted from the general VAT. It corresponds to VAT * 0.65.
NOT supported in the case of 'gross_values' (Chile).

net_amount.description:
Required, except in the case of gross values.
Total value of taxable items. It should NOT be entered if using the 'gross_values' option.

taxes_amount.description: Sum of other taxes, can be negative if there are withholding taxes. NOT supported in the case of 'gross_values'.

country_id.description:
Country ID where the account is created, supported IDs are:\
253 = Chile\
89 = United States\
66 = Colombia\
80 = Mexico\
83 = Per

contact_name.description: Contact name associated with the account that will be created.

contact_phone.description:
Contact phone associated with the account that will be created, format: \
+56xxxxxxxxx = Chile\
+1xxxxxxxxx = United States.

admin_email.description:
Admin email associated with the account that will be created.\
Valid for login.

admin_password.description:
Admin password associated with the account that will be created.\
Valid for login.

registration_legal_name_company.description: Legal name of the company being registered.

registration_tax_id_code.description:
Tax ID code of the company being registered, format: \
xx.xxx.xxx-x for Chile

registration_tax_id_type.description:
Tax ID type of the company being registered, supported IDs are:\
CL-RUT = Chile RUT\
US-EIN = United States EIN\
US-SSN = United States SSN\
CO-NIT = Colombia NIT\
PE-RUC = Peru RUC\
MX-RFC = Mexico RFC

registration_company_size.description: Size of the company being registered.

registration_terms_of_use.description:
Acceptance of the terms of use.\
1 = Accepted

registration_type_use.description:
Type use of the accounts being registered, supported IDs are:\
1 = Billing

registration_company_industry_sector.description: Industry sector of the company being registered.

registration_additional_data.description: Required for certain countries. Check individual fields for more information

registration_test_set_id.description: Required for Colombia. TEST SET ID provided by DIAN

registration_form_rut.description:
Required for Colombia. RUT PDF form provided by DIAN\
format: PDF encoded as base64

certificate_file.description:
Required for Chile. Digital certificate file.\
format: PFX encoded as base64

certificate_key.description:
Required for Mexico. Private key provided by SAT.\
format: DER format just as provided by the SAT

certificate_cer.description:
Required for Mexico. Public certificate provided by SAT.\
format: DER format just as provided by the SAT

certificate_password.description: Required for Chile and Mexico. The certificate password

account_id.description: Returns the ID of the created account.

certificate_duration.description:
Duration year of the digital certificate \
1 = 1 year\
2 = 2 years\
3 = 3 years

parent_account_id.description: ID of the parent account that is creating the digital certificate link.

certificate_issuance_id.description: ID of the digital certificate link.

certificate_generation_link.description: Link to generate the digital certificate.

document_type_id.description: Document type ID according to document type table.

document_type_taxbureau.description: Type of document at the tax bureau.

taxbureau_validation_status.description: Document status at the tax bureau.

issuer_tax_id_code.description: Tax ID code according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

issuer_tax_id_type.description: Tax ID type according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

issuer_district.description: Identifier for the district of the document issuer

issuer_city.description: Identifier for the city of the document issuer

issuer_state_id.description: Refers to the issuer's state. Empty if it doesn't apply. This is a required field on some countries, check the examples for your country

issuer_country_id.description: Identifier for the country of the document issuer

issuer_activity.description: Represents the activity or business operation of the document issuer

issuer_postalcode.description: Optional postal code according to the national format.

receiver_tax_id_code.description: The tax identification code of the document receiver

receiver_tax_id_type.description: Tax ID type according to tax id table. Required when the document requires the receiver to be specified.

receiver_district.description: The location code of the document receiver

receiver_city.description: The city of the document receiver

receiver_state_id.description: Refers to the recipient's state. Empty if it doesn't apply. This is a required field on some countries, check the examples for your country

receiver_country_id.description: Country ID according to ID table

receiver_phone.description: The phone of the document receiver

receiver_activity.description: The activity of the document receiver

receiver_postalcode.description: Optional postal code according to the national format.

payment_conditions.description: Payment due dates separated by comma. Example: 0 = same day, 30 = 30 days 0,30 = 50% on issuance date, 50% 30 days later, 0,30,60 = 33% on issuance, 33% 30 days, 34% 60 days

currency_id.description: Currency ID according to currency table

transportation_doc_type.description: Waybills only. 1 = Operation constitutes a sale  2 = Ventas por efectuar 3 = Consignaciones 4 = Entrega gratuita 5 = Traslados internos 6 = Otros traslados no venta 7 = Gua de devolucin 8 = Traslado para exportacin (no venta) 9 = Venta para exportacin

transportation_doc_billing.description: Waybills only. 1 = Despacho por cuenta del receptor 2 = Despacho por cuenta del emisor a instalaciones del receptor 3 = Despacho por cuenta del emisor a otras instalaciones

tax_period_month.description: Tax period where the documents should be accounted

tax_period_year.description: Tax period where the documents should be accounted

document_status.description: 0 = draft 1= document_issued 2=document sent to counterparty 3 = document accepted by counterparty

taxbureau_send_id.description: Read only. Null if not sent to tax bureau

taxbureau_send_date.description: Read only. Null if not sent to tax bureau

quantity.description: Quantity of this product or service included in this line

line_description.description: Short description to be included in the invoice as line title. Max 100 chars

unit_measure.description: Unit that this line is measured in

vat_status.description: Identify if it has value added tax.

long_description.description: Long description to be included in the invoice as line title. Max 100 chars

total_taxes.description: Total of all taxes included for this detail

modifier_percentage.description: Positive or negative percentage to be applied before calculating the line total. Example: -6.5 for a 6.5% discount

total_amount_line.description: Total of the line, including net price and taxes

tax_percentage.description: Percentage if the tax is applied by percentage.

tax_amount.description: Total tax amount according to the full net amount of this detail line. Should match percentage if entered

net_amount.description: Total of all net values from each of the detail lines.

country_id.description: Country ID of the created account.

contact_name.description: Contact name of the created account.

contact_phone.description: Contact phone of the created account.

admin_email.description: Admin email of the created account.

registration_legal_name_company.description: Legal name company of the created account.

registration_tax_id_code.description: TAX ID code of the created account.

registration_tax_id_type.description: TAX ID type of the created account.

registration_company_size.description: Company size of the created account.

registration_company_industry_sector.description: Company industry sector of the created account.

registration_type_use.description:
Type use of the created account.\
1 = Billing

certification_status.description: Certification status of the created account.

date.description: Date of the certification status of the created account.

certificate_issuance_id.description: ID of the digital certificate link.

certificate_status.description:
Digital certificate status.\
0 = Pending\
1 = Form completed\
2 = Identity validated\
3 = Certificate downloaded

certificate_file.description:
Digital certificate in base64 format. \
This field is displayed only if the certificate_status is 3 = Certificate downloaded

product_id.description: Read only. Internal ID of the product

sku.description: Internal code that identifies a product or service. If not entered, an automatic number will be assigned

invoicing_long_description.description: Optional. Extra information to be included in the long_description of invoices

internal_description.description: Optional. Additional information to be used internally

barcode.description: Optional. Barcode that is printed on the product box, usually generated by the supplier

measuring_unit.description: Optional. The unit this product is measured in. Example: Kilograms, days, Pounds, etc.

embedded_quantity_barcode.description: Optional. This field is used to identify when a product can be sold using embedded quantity barcodes. 0 = not a quantity barcode product. 1 = quantity barcode enabled. 0 by default

embedded_quantity_barcode_decimals.description: Optional. Decimals associated with the quantity barcode. 0 by default

price_taxes.description: Total taxes applicable to the price

currency_id.description: Currency ID according to currency table

tax_percentage.description: Percentage if the tax is applied by percentage

tax_amount.description: Total tax amount according to the full net amount

price_list_id.description: Unique identifier for the price list

price_list_name.description: Name of the price list, e.g., wholesale, retail

document_type_id.description: Read only. ID of the document type

name.description: Read only. Document type name in the local language

country_id.description: Read only. Country ID according to ID table

document_id.description: The ID of the document associated with the payment.

payment_type_id.description: The ID of the payment type.

cash_account_id.description: The ID of the cash account associated with the payment.

document_id.description: The ID of the document associated with the payment.

payment_type_id.description: The ID of the payment type.

cash_account_id.description: The ID of the cash account associated with the payment.
